meanings.sent1: She remained unruffled during the storm, showing no signs of fear.
meanings.sent2: The unruffled lake reflected the clear blue sky perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Even when the cat knocked over the vase, she stayed unruffled and simply cleaned up the mess.
meanings.sent4: His unruffled demeanor in the face of danger was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unruffled surface of the water mirrored the peacefulness of her mind.

meanings.sent1: Her unruffled desk was a model of organization and tidiness.
meanings.sent2: The unruffled books on the shelf were arranged by size and color.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chaos around her, she managed to keep her workspace unruffled and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The unruffled garden displayed rows of perfectly aligned flowers and plants.
meanings.sent5: The unruffled room exuded a sense of calm and orderliness.
